    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      Card(Card cardToCopy, long cardId)
      Used to allow for copying a card,
      also allow the above "idea of card" to become a full fledged card, I'm sorry.
      Card(java.lang.String cardName, java.lang.String type, java.lang.String subtype, java.lang.String ability, java.lang.String flavour, int power, int toughness, int loyalty, int manaCostBlack, int manaCostBlue, int manaCostGreen, int manaCostRed, int manaCostWhite, int manaCostBlank, int manaCostX)
      Creates the general idea of the card This version is however not to be used directly but rather to be copied through the other constructor

    • Constructor Detail

      • Card

        public Card(java.lang.String cardName,
            java.lang.String type,
            java.lang.String subtype,
            java.lang.String ability,
            java.lang.String flavour,
            int power,
            int toughness,
            int loyalty,
            int manaCostBlack,
            int manaCostBlue,
            int manaCostGreen,
            int manaCostRed,
            int manaCostWhite,
            int manaCostBlank,
            int manaCostX)
        Creates the general idea of the card This version is however not to be used directly but rather to be copied through the other constructor
        Parameters:
        cardName - name of the card
        type - types of the card, separated by spaces
        subtype - subtypes, separated by spaces
        ability - abilties, preferably separated by linebreak
        flavour - bonus text
        power - the cards desired attack power TODO document special values
        toughness - the cards "health"
        loyalty - used by those who walk on the plains
        manaCostBlack - mana needed to play the card
        manaCostBlue - mana needed to play the card
        manaCostGreen - mana needed to play the card
        manaCostRed - mana needed to play the card
        manaCostWhite - mana needed to play the card
        manaCostBlank - mana needed to play the card

      • Card

        public Card(Card cardToCopy,
            long cardId)
        Used to allow for copying a card,
        also allow the above "idea of card" to become a full fledged card, I'm sorry.
        Parameters:
        cardToCopy - the card that you want a copy of
        cardId - the id the new card should have you have to make sure yourself that no two cards share an id number in the local scope desired

      • smoothMove

        public void smoothMove(double changeX,
                       double changeY)
        Smoothly slides the card along, uses default movement speed of 30ms
        Parameters:
        changeX - how much the card should move horizontaly
        changeY - how much the card should move verticly

      • smoothMove

        public void smoothMove(double changeX,
                       double changeY,
                       int moveSpeed)
        Smoothly slides the card along
        Parameters:
        changeX - how much the card should move horizontaly
        changeY - how much the card should move verticly
        moveSpeed - how many milli secounds the move should last

      • smoothPlace

        public void smoothPlace(double posX,
                        double posY)
        Smoothly moves the card to the set coordinate
        If the coordinate is out of bounds then it's set to the bound
        This version uses the default transitionSpeed of 200
        Parameters:
        posX - the x coordinate the card should end up at
        posY - the Y coordinate the card should end up at

      • smoothPlace

        public void smoothPlace(double posX,
                        double posY,
                        int transitionSpeed)
        Smoothly moves the card to the set coordinate
        Parameters:
        posX - the x coordinate the card should end up at
        posY - the Y coordinate the card should end up at
        transitionSpeed - how long the animation should take, in milliseconds
